about.title: About Me
about.description1: I am a passionate software developer with experience in various technologies and frameworks. I love creating innovative solutions and learning new technologies.
about.description2: My goal is to develop high-quality, scalable applications that provide real value to users while continuously improving my skills and knowledge in the field.

skillDescriptions.webDev: Design and develop responsive, user-friendly websites and web apps.
skillDescriptions.database: Design, optimize databases, and write SQL queries for efficient data handling.
skillDescriptions.softwareDev: Develop scalable software solutions using best architecture practices.
skillDescriptions.gameDev: Create engaging games using Unity and optimize gameplay.
skillDescriptions.testing: Implement testing strategies to ensure app quality and minimize bugs.
skillDescriptions.algorithms: Design efficient algorithms focused on performance and scalability.

portfolioProject.title: Personal Portfolio
portfolioProject.description: A responsive portfolio website built using React and Tailwind CSS, featuring smooth animations and modern design.
